## ChildStateType type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ChildStateType<
  K extends string = string,
  S = unknown
> = StateType<
  {
    plugin: K
    state?: S
  },
  string,
  {
    get(): string
    id: string
    render: (props?: PluginProps) => React.ReactElement
    replace: (plugin: K, state?: S) => void
  }
>
```
